oracle.dss.dataView
Class BasePayloadHelper

java.lang.Object
  oracle.dss.dataView.BasePayloadHelper

public class BasePayloadHelper
extends java.lang.Object

Since:
release specific (what release of product did this appear in)
For internal use only. Application developers should not use this
Base class for forming data change update hints. This is extended in the dvt-faces module for ADS updates.
